title: Loma Hermosa
text:
Loma Hermosa is a town in <a href="Tres%20de%20Febrero%20Partido">Tres de Febrero Partido</a> of <a href="Buenos%20Aires%20Province">Buenos Aires Province</a>, Argentina. It is located in the <a href="Greater%20Buenos%20Aires">Greater Buenos Aires</a> urban agglomeration. Part of the town falls in the <a href="General%20San%20Mart%C3%ADn%20Partido">General San Martín Partido</a>.
Sport.
The <a href="Asociaci%C3%B3n%20Social%20y%20Deportiva%20Justo%20Jos%C3%A9%20de%20Urquiza">Asociación Social y Deportiva Justo José de Urquiza</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club is based in Loma Hermosa.
